summary: Replaces the Flamecloak spell with a new \"Ancestor Guardian\" spell, this is a spell based on the oblivion dunmer abilty
descriptionHtml:
Ancestor Guardian for Dunmer

This is just a small mod that i made after i decided i didnt like the Flame cloak spell too much.
So this mod now replaces the default Dunmer power \"flamecloak\" with the spell \"Ancestor Guardian\"
this is a spell based on the oblivion dunmer abilty.The summon lasts for 60 seconds then he will disappear
or if he dies in under 60 seconds.

i also realise that there is a very simular mod by \"Somokon\" however it was very buggy for me and and other users.

ive tested the mod a fair bit however there is only so much testing i alone can do. so if you have any issues leave a comment
and i shall try to respond and update.

\"Summon forth a ghost of one of your fallen ancestors to defend you for 60 seconds.\"



-Joplay299
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=632190
author: Joplay2999
